bibl.title: Some New Thoughts about the Supposed Fragment of Philistus (PSI 1283).
bibl.note: P.S.I. XII, 1283 (= Pack2 1343). Provides a text in which both vocabulary and idiom are reminiscent of Thucydides and might seem suitable for a 'Thucydidean' writer like Philistus.
bibl.seg: Pearson Lionel, Some New Thoughts about the Supposed Fragment of Philistus (PSI 1283).
P.S.I. XII, 1283 (= Pack2 1343). Provides a text in which both vocabulary and idiom are reminiscent of Thucydides and might seem suitable for a 'Thucydidean' writer like Philistus.
